resources.string: I\'m Java Developer focused on Android platform and User Experience. Hothead in mobile technologies. Placetag co-founder and Sealcode.org member. I develop using Android Studio and Git control version. Also I have a little bit experience in technologies and tools such as: Python, C#, C++, HTML, CSS, Joomla, Photoshop.

I discover the world by traveling, getting know the people, eating new things and learning foreign languages. Taking photo is the way to keep all memories in my mind. Also I try to life healthy by cooking and playing sport especially football. I\'m a big fan o AC Milan and Poland national team in every sport. I listen to music every day and in free time watch movies.
